question: I lost my wallet today probably in one of the faculty buildings or Masjid Sultan Ismail. My matric is inside the wallet. Name: Abdulrahman Alsakkaf. Please if you find it contact me.
السلام عليكم شباب حد يعرف طريقه التسجيل لل industrial training لأن وصلني إيميل طلب أسجل عبر موقع الجامعة
answer: على الأغلب هذا السمستر تغير الوضع لقيته في ال student portal. Myutm>Academic>Student portal

question: What are the general courses being discontinued by the University starting from Semester 2, Session 2024/2025?
answer: The University will discontinue the following general courses: UHMT1012/UHAK1012 - Graduate Success Attributes, UHIT2302/UICL2302 - Science and Technology Thinking, UKQT3001/UKQE3001 - ExCEL, UBSS1032/UHAK1032 - Introduction to Entrepreneurship, Uxxx2xx2 - University General Elective Course.
